help-file.title: BRAVO
help-file.content:
The Bravo is a Rogue sub-class with enhanced melee abilties. Bravos are quite agile allowing them to strike their foes with exceptional speed and ferocity.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th: Innate Dual Daggers
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th: Trip 36th: Enhanced Riposte 51st: Triple Attack
